trans-unit.source: Represents the method that is called when an <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext?displayProperty=fullName> object has finished processing.
trans-unit.target: 代表的方法時，會呼叫<xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext?displayProperty=fullName>物件已完成處理。

trans-unit.source: Use an InstanceContextIdleCallback to notify the [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] runtime that an InstanceContextIdleCallback object has finished processing.
trans-unit.target: 使用 InstanceContextIdleCallback 通知[!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]InstanceContextIdleCallback 物件已完成處理的執行階段。

trans-unit.source: When the InstanceContextIdleCallback object notifies the runtime that the InstanceContextIdleCallback has finished its work, [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] calls <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.IsIdle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> once again.
trans-unit.target: 當 InstanceContextIdleCallback 物件通知執行階段 InstanceContextIdleCallback 已完成其工作時，[!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]呼叫<xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.IsIdle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>再次。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.IsIdle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This cycle continues until <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.IsIdle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> returns `true` and the context is closed and recycled.
trans-unit.target: 這個循環會持續直到<xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.IsIdle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>傳回`true`和內容已關閉並回收。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.IsIdle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>
